title: ETSI Domain AI
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-ai-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20330
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain AI
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Domain marker concept for categorizing metaverse components related to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and computational intelligence capabilities.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainAI
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[ComputationAndIntelligenceDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-ai-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[ArtificialIntelligence]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- has-part:: [[ETSI Domain AI Creative Media]]
		- has-part:: [[ETSI Domain AI Human Interface]]
		- has-part:: [[ETSI Domain AI Data Mgmt]]
		- has-part:: [[ETSI Domain AI Governance]]
		- enables:: [[Intelligence Layer Categorization]]
		- enables:: [[AI Service Classification]]
		- depends-on:: [[ComputationAndIntelligenceDomain]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[ETSI_Domain_AI___Creative_Media]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[ETSI_Domain_AI___Human_Interface]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[ETSI_Domain_AI___Governance]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[ETSI_Domain_AI___Data_Mgmt]]

ontology.definition: Domain marker concept for categorizing metaverse components related to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and computational intelligence capabilities.
